channel.title: Monitoring on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Monitoring on Modernization workshop

item.title: Application Modernization with Datadog
item.description: In this workshop we are going to look at moving an application from EC2 instances to Kubernetes. Then we will transition the app from the current environment to Kubernetes. From there we will look at what is required to monitor the application to ensure it is performing well.

item.title: One Observability Workshop
item.description: This workshop is aimed at providing an hands-on experience for you on the wide variety of toolsets AWS offers to setup monitoring and observability on your applications.
